PATIENT_ID: TEST_CA_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-17 03:00:00
Code blue called at 0300, patient found pulseless.
Cardiac arrest with asystole on monitor.
CPR initiated immediately, chest compressions performed.
ACLS protocol followed. Defibrillation delivered x2.
Resuscitation successful, return of spontaneous circulation after 8 minutes.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-17 03:05:00
Code blue response â€” compressions initiated at bedside.
Cardiac arrest documented. Patient pulseless.
